violations.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
violations.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

nodes.html: <h3 class="wp-block-heading alignfull has-text-align-center has-white-color has-text-color has-background" style="background-color:#0085ac;font-size:clamp(16.293px, 1.018rem + ((1vw - 3.2px) * 1.075), 25px);font-style:normal;font-weight:400">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

violations.description: Ensure that lists are structured correctly
violations.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  List element has direct children that are not allowed: div
